name: Officer Richards
descriptions: Officer Richards is a member of Vault 101 security in Fallout 3. He guards the locked atrium door to the Vault 101 entrance together with Officer O'Brian.

A little more stable than his sadistic partner, Richards is nonetheless perfectly willing to open fire on hapless dwellers, as per his standing orders. The posting at the atrium door, separating the entrance from the rest of the Vault, is a perfect spot for this.
